title: Terry Gilliam Confronts His Most Absurd Legacy: ‘I’m Responsible for QAnon’
summary: Terry Gilliam always knew that “Fear and Loathing in Las Vegas” would leave a cultural mark far outstripping its modest box-office returns. But he never thought it would morph into a kind of foundational text for the tinfoil-hat right. “I’m responsible for QAnon,” he says, half in disbelief, referr…
